dublinCore.description: Interactive MicroSim for implementing and validating Dublin Core metadata. Students fill in all 15 Dublin Core elements organized by priority (Required, Recommended, Optional) and receive real-time feedback on completeness and quality through a circular gauge. Features include color-coded field validation, quality scoring with bonuses, example loading, and JSON export.

educational.learningObjective: Students will implement complete Dublin Core metadata by filling in all 15 elements and receiving feedback on completeness and quality.
